import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get organization types by IDs"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/organizations/types/ids"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns organization type records for a supplied list of OrganizationTypeId values. Use this when you already have IDs from a query and want a compact lookup without additional filtering.

**Prerequisites**
1. **OrganizationTypeId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/organizations/types/query](/docs/api/organizations/get-organization-types-by-query-get) and extract `Items[].OrganizationTypeId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Gather OrganizationTypeId values from a query response.
2. Call [GET /api/v1.0/organizations/types/ids](/docs/api/organizations/get-organization-types-by-ids) with the ID array in the request body.

**Minimal Required Fields**: OrganizationTypeId array in the request body.

**Notes**: This API version is deprecated.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

Null for global types."},"Scope":{"type":"string","enum":["Global","Site"],"description":"Scope of the organization type - Global or Site-specific."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the organization type."}},"title":"OrganizationType"}},"Paging":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Pagination details returned with paged user search results.","properties":{"TotalRows":{"type":"integer","description":"Total number of rows available across all pages.","example":54343},"PageCount":{"type":"integer","description":"Total number of pages available for the current query.","example":10869},"PageSize":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of records returned per page.","example":5},"PageIndex":{"type":"integer","description":"Zero-based index of the current page returned in the response.","example":0}},"title":"PagingMetadata"}],"nullable":true,"type":"object"},"IsSuccess":{"type":"boolean"},"Errors":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Standard error payload returned by the API when a request fails.","properties":{"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code associated with the failure","example":401},"Message":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable description of the error","example":"Attempted to perform an unauthorized operation."}},"required":["StatusCode","Message"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}},"title":"OrganizationTypeListResponse"}}}}}}
>
